Articles.Content:
Aaaaaaaaah!!!

Close the doors!!

Shut the Windows!!!

There is a Riot going on out there!!

Kerbals all around Kerbin are protesting that KSC is planning to put Goo in sealed Containers and expose it to harmfull and dangerous environments only to see how it behaves...

They are crazy, don't they know how valuable this knowledge is to all of Kerbalkind? How we could make our lives easier and saver if we are going on with these experiments?

They are saying that every Goo, allthough it might be mysterious, is also just a Kerbal. We might keep the goos as pets, cuddle with them, sleep with them in our beds and develope heartly feelings for them.

But it is sacrifice that gives you the most in return.

We have to stop these protestors to go on with this nonsense!!

Look with what they tried to confuse me!!

Edited October 14, 2013 by MalfunctionM1Ke

Silly people !

This is Science, Goo should be proud to help us bringing a brighter and prosperous future.

We are also offering them a free trip to space (even if we can't guarantee a way back).

Science is the future !

Save the Goo! Save the Goo! Rofl. I wonder how intelligent this Goo stuff is. I also wonder if kerbal k9s would eat the pet Goo on accident.

Have a "Goo day"
What these hippies need to realize is that ethical science is boring. Science without cruelty is like a spaceship without fuel.
Clearly your the type that burns the Goo with a magnifying glass.
LOL! Now you will say to me that a ring of naked kerbals will surround the launchpad?

Yes, but the big question, can the goo be used as a fuel?

If so, is it much more powerful than lighting Jeb's farts???

LOL! Now you will say to me that a ring of naked kerbals will surround the launchpad?

Quick! Start a rocket and they are all goone!
Huh? I thought goo is just a reprocessed waste from jell-o factory. Now you are telling me that i should cuddle with it? *is confused*

I didn't have any problem with launching goo into space, but now that I see how cute the goo is, I don't wana hurt it! I'll still launch it into space of course, if it's good enough treatment for a kerbal, it's good enough for a goo! I'll bring it back safely though, I pwomise!
